verses.text: \w Moreover|strong="G1161"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, we \w do|strong="G1107"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* to \w wit|strong="G1107"\w* of the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w bestowed|strong="G1325"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*;

How \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w trial|strong="G1382"\w* of \w affliction|strong="G2347"\w* the \w abundance|strong="G4050"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w deep|strong="G0899"\w* \w poverty|strong="G4432"\w* \w abounded|strong="G4052"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w liberality|strong="G0572"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \add their\add* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, I bear \w record|strong="G3140"\w*, yea, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beyond|strong="G5228"\w* \add their\add* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \add they were\add* willing of \w themselves|strong="G0830"\w*;

\w Praying|strong="G1189"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w intreaty|strong="G3874"\w* that \w we|strong="G2248"\w* would \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* the \w gift|strong="G5485"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add take upon us\add* the \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* of the \w ministering|strong="G1248"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add this they did\add*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* we \w hoped|strong="G1679"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* their own \w selves|strong="G1438"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Insomuch|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G3870"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w desired|strong="G3870"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he had \w begun|strong="G4278"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* he would \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w finish|strong="G2005"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G0235"\w*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* ye \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \add thing, in\add* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w utterance|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add in\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w diligence|strong="G4710"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add in\add* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \add see\add* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w commandment|strong="G2003"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* by \w occasion|strong="G1223"\w* of the \w forwardness|strong="G4710"\w* of \w others|strong="G2087"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w prove|strong="G1381"\w* the \w sincerity|strong="G1103"\w* of \w your|strong="G5212"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1097"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, though he \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w*, yet \w for|strong="G1223"\w* your \w sakes|strong="G5209"\w* he became \w poor|strong="G4433"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* through \w his|strong="G1565"\w* \w poverty|strong="G4432"\w* might be \w rich|strong="G4147"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w herein|strong="G1722"\w* I \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \add my\add* \w advice|strong="G1106"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* is \w expedient|strong="G4851"\w* for \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* have begun \w before|strong="G4278"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to be \w forward|strong="G2309"\w* a year \w ago|strong="G4070"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G3570"\w* \w therefore|strong="G2532"\w* \w perform|strong="G2005"\w* the \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* \add of it\add*; \w that|strong="G3704"\w* \w as|strong="G2509"\w* \add there was\add* a \w readiness|strong="G4288"\w* to \w will|strong="G2309"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \add there may be\add* a \w performance|strong="G2005"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* there be \w first|strong="G4295"\w* a willing \w mind|strong="G4288"\w*, \add it is\add* \w accepted|strong="G2144"\w* according to \w that|strong="G2526"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w*, \add and\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* according \w to|strong="G2526"\w* that he \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \add I mean\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* other \w men|strong="G0243"\w* be \w eased|strong="G0425"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5213"\w* \w burdened|strong="G2347"\w*:

But by an equality, \add that\add* now at this time your abundance \add may be a supply\add* for their want, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w their|strong="G1565"\w* \w abundance|strong="G4051"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* may \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \add a supply\add* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w want|strong="G5303"\w*: \w that|strong="G3704"\w* there may \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w equality|strong="G2471"\w*:

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, He \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \add had gathered\add* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w had|strong="G4121"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w* \w over|strong="G4121"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \add had gathered\add* \w little|strong="G3641"\w* \w had|strong="G1641"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w lack|strong="G1641"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w thanks|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w put|strong="G1325"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* earnest \w care|strong="G4710"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* of \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* he \w accepted|strong="G1209"\w* the \w exhortation|strong="G3874"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w being|strong="G5225"\w* more \w forward|strong="G4705"\w*, of his own \w accord|strong="G0830"\w* he \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* we have \w sent|strong="G4842"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* \add is\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1223"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \add that\add* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* who \w was|strong="G5500"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w chosen|strong="G5500"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* to travel \w with|strong="G4898"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w administered|strong="G1247"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add declaration of\add* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* ready \w mind|strong="G4288"\w*:

\w Avoiding|strong="G4724"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, that \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* should \w blame|strong="G3469"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w abundance|strong="G0100"\w* which is \w administered|strong="G1247"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*:

Providing \w for|strong="G4306"\w* honest \w things|strong="G2570"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* we have sent \w with|strong="G4842"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G1381"\w* \w oftentimes|strong="G4178"\w* \w proved|strong="G1381"\w* \w diligent|strong="G4705"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* many \w things|strong="G4183"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* more \w diligent|strong="G4706"\w*, upon the \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w confidence|strong="G4006"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \add I have\add* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w Whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add any do enquire\add* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, \add he is\add* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w partner|strong="G2844"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fellowhelper|strong="G4904"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*: \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \add be enquired of, they are\add* the \w messengers|strong="G0652"\w* of the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*, \add and\add* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G3767"\w* shew \w ye|strong="G1731"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w before|strong="G4383"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*, the \w proof|strong="G1732"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w boasting|strong="G2746"\w* \w on|strong="G5228"\w* your \w behalf|strong="G5216"\w*.
